Toolbox

John Coene

2018-04-08

Source: vignettes/toolbox.Rmd

The toolbox allows you to add neat little interactive functions to your plots.

mtcars %>% 
  e_charts(qsec) %>% 
  e_line(mpg, smooth = TRUE) -> echsart

echsart %>% e_toolbox(feature = "saveAsImage") # hit the download button!
echsart %>% e_toolbox(feature = "dataZoom")
echsart %>% e_toolbox(feature = "dataView")

Developed by John Coene.

Site built with pkgdown.
